data.eml:eml: A new marine cyclopoid copepod of the genus Neocyclops (Cyclopidae, Halicyclopinae) from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Jimin, Chang, Cheon Young (2015): A new marine cyclopoid copepod of the genus Neocyclops (Cyclopidae, Halicyclopinae) from Korea. ZooKeys 520: 131-146, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.520.6006, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.520.6006
